SELECT CompleteAndRejectList.ProcessArchiveID AS "ProcessArchiveID" , CompleteAndRejectList.PerformerID AS "PerformerID" , CompleteAndRejectList.WorkitemArchiveID AS "WorkitemArchiveID" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" , CompleteAndRejectList.InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , CompleteAndRejectList.InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , CompleteAndRejectList.InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , CompleteAndRejectList.InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , CompleteAndRejectList.UserCode AS "UserCode" , CompleteAndRejectList.UserName AS "UserName" , CompleteAndRejectList.SubKind AS "SubKind" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormSubKind AS "FormSubKind" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormID AS "FormID" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormName AS "FormName" , CompleteAndRejectList.FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , CompleteAndRejectList.IsSecureDoc AS "IsSecureDoc" , CompleteAndRejectList.IsFile AS "IsFile" , CompleteAndRejectList.FileExt AS "FileExt" , CompleteAndRejectList.IsComment AS "IsComment" , CompleteAndRejectList.DocNo AS "DocNo" , CompleteAndRejectList.ApproverCode AS "ApproverCode" , CompleteAndRejectList.ApproverName AS "ApproverName" , CompleteAndRejectList.ApprovalStep AS "ApprovalStep" , CompleteAndRejectList.ApproverSIPAddress AS "ApproverSIPAddress" , CompleteAndRejectList.IsReserved AS "IsReserved" , CompleteAndRejectList.ReservedGubun AS "ReservedGubun" , CompleteAndRejectList.ReservedTime AS "ReservedTime" , CompleteAndRejectList.Priority AS "Priority" , CompleteAndRejectList.IsModify AS "IsModify" , CompleteAndRejectList.Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , CompleteAndRejectList.Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" , CompleteAndRejectList.EndDate AS "EndDate" , CompleteAndRejectList.RealEndDate AS "RealEndDate" , CompleteAndRejectList.TYPE AS "TYPE" FROM ( SELECT CompleteList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.* , B.EndDate AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate , 'Complete' AS TYPE FROM JWF_Workitem A INNER JOIN JWF_Process B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' AND B.ProcessState = '528' ) CompleteList
UNION ALL
SELECT RejectList.* FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.* , B.EndDate AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate , 'Reject' AS TYPE FROM JWF_Workitem A INNER JOIN JWF_Process B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind = 'T006' AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T109','T020','T021') AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_02' AND B.ProcessState = '528' ) RejectList ) CompleteAndRejectList WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 6 ORDER BY RealEndDate DESC

SELECT A.FormID AS "FormID" , A.FormName AS "LabelText" , A.FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" FROM JWF_FORMS A INNER JOIN JWF_FORMCLASS B ON A.FormClassID = B.FormClassID INNER JOIN JWF_USERFORMS C ON A.formID = C.FormID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userCode} AND A.IsUse = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 6 ORDER BY C.CreateDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_Workitem B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_Performer C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ProcessID FROM JWF_PROCESS A INNER JOIN JWF_Workitem B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_Performer C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE B.DeputyID = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288 ) ApprovalList

SELECT TO_CHAR(LISTAGG(FormInstID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY FormInstID)) AS "FormInstIDs" FROM( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.FormInstID FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_WORKITEMARCHIVE A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_PROCESSARCHIVE B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTIONARCHIVE C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID LEFT OUTER JOIN JWF_FORMS F ON C.FormID = F.FormID WHERE A.DeputyID = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' UNION ALL SELECT C.FormInstID FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_WORKITEMARCHIVE A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_PROCESSARCHIVE B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J_ARCHIVE.JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTIONARCHIVE C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID LEFT OUTER JOIN JWF_FORMS F ON C.FormID = F.FormID WHERE A.DeputyID = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' ORDER BY FormInstID ) CompleteList GROUP BY FormInstID) d

SELECT CompleteList.ProcessArchiveID AS "ProcessArchiveID" , CompleteList.PerformerID AS "PerformerID" , CompleteList.WorkitemArchiveID AS "WorkitemArchiveID" , CompleteList.FormPrefix AS "FormPrefix" , CompleteList.InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , CompleteList.InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , CompleteList.InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , CompleteList.InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , CompleteList.UserCode AS "UserCode" , CompleteList.UserName AS "UserName" , CompleteList.SubKind AS "SubKind" , CompleteList.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID AS "ProcessDescriptionArchiveID" , CompleteList.FormInstID AS "FormInstID" , CompleteList.FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , CompleteList.EndDate AS "EndDate" , CompleteList.RealEndDate AS "RealEndDate" FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID , C.FormInstID , C.FormSubject , TO_CHAR(B.EndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate FROM JWF_WORKITEMARCHIVE A INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSARCHIVE B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTIONARCHIVE C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE ( A.UserCode = #{targetCode} OR A.DeputyId = #{targetCode} ) AND B.InitiatorID = #{userCode} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01'
UNION ALL
SELECT B.ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID , C.FormInstID , C.FormSubject , TO_CHAR(B.EndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS EndDate , B.EndDate AS RealEndDate FROM JWF_WORKITEMARCHIVE A INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSARCHIVE B ON B.ProcessArchiveID = A.ProcessArchiveID INNER JOIN JWF_PROCESSDESCRIPTIONARCHIVE C ON B.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID = C.ProcessDescriptionArchiveID WHERE ( A.UserCode = #{userCode} OR A.DeputyId = #{userCode} ) AND B.InitiatorID = #{targetCode} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021') AND A.Deleted IS NULL AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' ORDER BY WorkitemArchiveID DESC ) CompleteList WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY RealEndDate DESC
